articles.author: Gerry Smith
articles.title: Cantor Analysts Blast RFK Jr., Warn of ‘Dangerous Territory’ - Bloomberg
articles.description: Cantor Fitzgerald biotech analysts slammed the leadership of Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr., calling on the Trump administration to “re-evaluate” his role after a top vaccine official stepped down.

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Google’s new experimental Gemini 2.5 model rolls out to free users - Ars Technica
articles.description: Google’s improved AI model is now available for free, but usage is limited.
